title: Add database indexes for frequently queried columns
close_reason: Existing indexes are sufficient: date, type, and modelOrganism are already indexed. Pre-computed filter tables eliminate need for JSON array indexing.

title: Run validation: type check, build, tests
description:
Run full validation to ensure FlyonUI integration is successful:

- Run bunx astro check (type checking)
- Run bun run build (production build)
- Run bun run test (all tests)
- Fix any TypeScript errors
- Fix any build errors
- Fix any test failures
- Ensure application runs correctly in dev mode

title: Create Navigation.astro component
description:
Create a unified Navigation.astro component with:

- Desktop navigation: Papers, Trends, Insights links
- Mobile hamburger menu button
- Mobile drawer (320px width)
- Active page highlighting logic
- Requirements:
  - NO search icon/button
  - NO language dropdown
  - NO theme toggle (VSCode theme only)
  - NO admin link (admin via direct URL only)
- Use FlyonUI components for drawer and navigation styling
- Accept currentPage prop for active state

- Test navigation rendering with all pages

title: Update pages to use MainLayout with currentPage prop
description:
Update all pages to use MainLayout with currentPage prop:

1. index.astro:
   - Change Layout → MainLayout (if needed)
   - Set currentPage="papers"

2. trends.astro:
   - Change Layout → MainLayout (if needed)
   - Set currentPage="trends"
   - Remove existing navigation links

3. insights.astro:
   - Change Layout → MainLayout
   - Set currentPage="insights"
   - Remove any existing header/nav

4. admin/index.astro:
   - Remove AdminHeader component import
   - Use MainLayout with currentPage="admin"
   - Keep admin-only content intact

Ensure all pages render correctly with unified navigation.

title: Fix insights page: use SQL aggregation instead of fetching all papers
close_reason: Fixed getTopicMomentum to use SQL aggregation instead of fetching all papers. Added 30-min cache to insights. Reduced paper limits: keyword cooccurrence 100, author network 50, method trends 100. All queries now ORDER BY date DESC to get most recent data.
